si.title: ද්විත්ව අභියෝගය
body_lines: කිසිදු පැකිලීමකින් තොරව දහස් ගණනක් ජනයා පවුලක් ලෙස පවුලේ නිවාස ආක්රමණය කළහ.

en.title: Double challenge
body_lines: Thousands of people invaded the homes of the family as a family, without any hesitation.

summary_lines: "Family home invasion: Thousands of people stormed a single-family residence without warning. The event was unprecedented and caused widespread shock."
